title: Getting a "Must be level 6 or higher to create a post" but I'm 21???
body: Am I missing something or is something borked?  I'm trying to post to the 'Boards Feedback' but it says "Must be level 6 or higher".  I'm level 21.  What am I missing.  Is there some sort of additional leveling system for the forums or something?

replies.body: Does commenting hopefully fix this problem?

Still having that problem... :(

Started playing on NA a few days back an am lvl 10 now. Really would love to look for people to play with on the boards but I'm not allowed to post... *sigh*

This stuff happens for several days now.
Maybe RIOT should change their floppy disks in their ZX Spectrums, because this nonsense is ridiculous.

Also, I just cleared my cache and had to reload twice, the boards are still official in "beta". After several years... RIOT has serious problems with code and programming, right?

This weird little issue pops up from time to time. For some reason, the boards weren't grabbing your Summoner level correctly, but once you posted here it forced your board and Summoner levels to sync up with each other. You're looking like a mighty level 21 to me now!
